en: Peppa and George are playing in the garden.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在花园里玩。

en: To me, George!
zh: 给我，乔治！

en: You threw the ball too hard, George!
zh: 你的球扔得太大力了，乔治！

en: So the rules say, I win!
zh: 所以按规则来说，我赢了！

en: Now it's my turn. I win again!
zh: 现在轮到我了。我又赢了！

en: Peppa, George. Today your big cousin Chloe is coming to visit!
zh: 佩奇，乔治，今天你们的堂姐克洛伊会来家里玩！

en: Yippee! Cousin Chloe!
zh: 好耶！堂姐克洛伊！

en: George, Chloe is a big girl,like me.
zh: 乔治，克洛伊像我一样是个大姑娘了。

en: So, don't be sad if she finds you too Little to play with.
zh: 所以，如果她觉得你太小不和你玩，你不要伤心哦。

en: I'm sure Chloe will play with both of you.
zh: 我相信克洛伊会和你们俩一起玩的。

en: Chloe is here!
zh: 克洛伊到了！

en: Aunty Pig has brought Chloe to spend the day at Peppa's house.
zh: 猪伯母带克洛伊来佩奇家里玩了。

en: Chloe is Peppa and George's cousin.
zh: 克洛伊是佩奇和乔治的堂姐。

en: Chloe is a bit older than Peppa and George.
zh: 克洛伊比佩奇和乔治大一点点。

en: Hello, Chloe!
zh: 你好，克洛伊！

en: Hello, Peppa! Hello, George!
zh: 你好，佩奇！你好，乔治！

en: See you later!
zh: 待会见！

en: Do you want to play a game?
zh: 想玩游戏吗？

en: Yes! Let's play "Catch!"
zh: 是的！我们来玩“你跑我追”!

en: Peppa loves playing "Catch".
zh: 佩奇喜欢玩“你跑我追”！

en: Do you still play "Catch"?
zh: 你还玩“你跑我追”？

en: That's a game for Little children.
zh: 那可是小孩子玩的游戏。

en: We only play "Catch"because George likes it.
zh: 我们玩“你跑我追”只是因为是乔治喜欢这个游戏。

en: Okay. Let's play it for George.
zh: 好吧。那我们陪乔治玩吧。

en: Do you play with the proper rules or the baby rules?
zh: 你是按大人的规则玩还是按小朋友的规则玩？

en: Proper rules!
zh: 按大人的规则！

en: I'll start. Peppa! You're "it".
zh: 开始了。佩奇！你是追的人。

en: Catch me if you can!
zh: 有本事就来抓我呀！

en: Peppa is "it". She has to chase Chloe and George.
zh: 佩奇是那个追的人。她要追克洛伊和乔治。

en: Can't catch me!
zh: 抓不到我吧！

en: George!
zh: 乔治！

en: I'm going to easily catch you! You're so Little!
zh: 要抓住你太简单了！你那么小！

en: That's not fair! You're helping George!
zh: 那样不公平！你在帮乔治！

en: That's because he's Little.
zh: 那是因为他还小。

en: Do you want me to help you?
zh: 你需要我来帮你吗？

en: No! I don't need help.I'm a big girl like you.
zh: 不，我不需要帮忙。我和你一样是个大姑娘了。

en: Come on, then, Peppa! Try and catch us!
zh: 来吧，佩奇！来抓我们吧！

en: Can't catch us!
zh: 抓不到我们！

en: This is a silly game.
zh: 这个游戏很傻气.

en: Can we play something else?
zh: 我们可以玩别的游戏吗？

en: Okay, I know a really good game for big children.
zh: 可以啊，我知道一个真正适合大孩子玩的好游戏。

en: It's called "Sly Fox"!
zh: 叫做“狡猾的狐狸”！

en: "Sly Fox"!!
zh: “狡猾的狐狸”！

en: I want to play "Sly Fox"!!
zh: 我想玩“狡猾的狐狸”

en: What is it?
zh: 它是什么？

en: One person is the "Sly Fox"and the others creep up on them.
zh: 由一个人来做“狡猾的狐狸”其他人悄悄地走上前。

en: Me! Me! I want to be the "Sly Fox"!
zh: 我来！我来！我要扮“狡猾的狐狸”！

en: Peppa is the "Sly Fox".
zh: 佩奇做"狡猾的狐狸"。

en: While her back is turned, the others creep up on her.
zh: 当她转过身去时，其他人悄悄地走向她。

en: But if Peppa turns and sees someone move，
zh: 但如果佩奇转过身看到谁在动

en: they have to go back to the start!
zh: 那他们就得走回去重新开始！

en: George, I saw you move!
zh: 乔治，我看到你动了！

en: Back to the start!
zh: 回去重新开始！

en: Got you! I win!
zh: 抓住你了！我赢了！

en: You moved before I was ready!
zh: 我还没准备好你就动了！

en: The rules say I can move when I like.
zh: 规则说我随时都可以动。

en: Don't they, George?
zh: 是不是，乔治?

en: Now it's Chloe's turn to be the "Sly Fox".
zh: 现在轮到克洛伊来做“狡猾的狐狸”了。

en: Peppa and George must stay very still.
zh: 佩奇和乔治必须保持不动。

en: Whoaao!
zh: 哇啊！

en: Peppa! I saw you move! Back to the start!
zh: 佩奇！我看到你动了！回到原位重新开始！

en: It's not fair! You looked too long!
zh: 不公平！你看得太久了！

en: The rules say, I can look as long as I want.
zh: 规则说，我想看多久就多久。

en: Back to the start.
zh: 回到原位重新开始。

en: George is the winner!
zh: 乔治赢了！

en: Can we play a different game?
zh: 我们可以玩别的游戏吗？

en: Yes.
zh: 可以。

en: But as long as it's a grown-up game.
zh: 但只能是大人玩的游戏。

en: I know!
zh: 我知道！

en: Let's play my favorite game!
zh: 我们来玩我最喜欢的游戏吧！

en: It's very grown-up!
zh: 大人的游戏！

en: George, do you know what Peppa's favorite game is?
zh: 乔治，你知道佩奇最喜欢的游戏是什么？

en: Peppa's favorite game is jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
zh: 佩奇最喜欢的游戏是在泥坑里跳来跳去！

en: George, if you jump in puddles,you must wear your boots!
zh: 乔治，如果你想跳到泥坑里玩，你必须穿上你的靴子！

en: I've brought some boots for you too, Chloe!
zh: 我也给你带了一双靴子，克洛伊！

en: I'm too grown-up to jump in muddy puddles.
zh: 我已经是大人了不能在泥坑里跳。

en: Oh. So am I.
zh: 哦。我也是。

en: George loves jumping in muddy puddles.
zh: 乔治喜欢跳到泥坑里玩。

en: Secretly, Peppa would love to jump in the puddle.
zh: 其实，佩奇也喜欢跳到泥坑里玩。

en: But she wants to look grown-up.
zh: 但是她想让自己看上去像个大人。

en: I hear there's some puddle jumping going on!
zh: 我听说这有跳泥坑可以玩！

en: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig love jumping in muddy puddles!
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸也喜欢跳到泥坑里玩！

en: It does look fun.
zh: 的确看起来很有趣。

en: Yes, it does.
zh: 是的，确实是。

en: Maybe there's a rule that says, big girls can jump in muddy puddles.
zh: 也许有条规则是，大姑娘也可以跳到泥坑里玩。

en: Yes! That's a good rule!
zh: 是的！这是个好规则！

en: Race you!
zh: 看谁快！

en: Peppa and Chloe love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
zh: 佩奇和克洛伊喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

en: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles,even grown-up girls!
zh: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去，即使是大姑娘也喜欢！
